pages.title: About this template

content.text: We created this template for your community. Below is a summary of the starting settings that come along with the
template. You can easily change the setup or further customize this space for your community by clicking and exploring
Every member that joins your space will receive the Default role. A default member will have:
Until changed by an Admin, a member with the Default role will be able to:
Create a proposal in any proposal category
Create a post in any forum category
Here are a couple of custom roles to get you started but feel free to create more or import from Discord, CollabLand, or Guild.
Assign this role to a member to help moderate your space. In addition to default permissions, a user with the Moderator role will be able to:
Moderate and access all Forum categories
The Core Contributor role is assigned as the Reviewer in all of the preset proposal templates.
You will start with these 8 categories and a corresponding proposal template for each:
You will start with these 6 forum categories:

pages.contentText: Attention, Admins! We created this template for your community. Below is a summary of the starting settings that come along with the Impact Community template. You can easily change the setup or further customize this space for your community by clicking and exploring ‚öôÔ∏è Settings in the side bar.üì´ NotificationsIn-app notifications are ENABLED for:‚úÖ Rewards‚úÖ Proposals‚úÖ Pollsüë§ Default Role PermissionsEvery member that joins your space will receive the Default role. A default member will have:üëÄ VIEW only access to   and subpages.‚úÖ FULL access to   and subpages.Until changed by an Admin, a member with the Default role will be able to:Create new pagesCreate new rewardsCreate a proposal in any proposal categoryCreate a post in any forum categoryüé© Custom RolesHere are a couple of custom roles to get you started but feel free to create more or import from Discord, CollabLand, or Guild.ModeratorAssign this role to a member to help moderate your space. In addition to default permissions, a user with the Moderator role will be able to:Delete any pageDelete any rewardDelete and archive any proposalModerate and access all Forum categoriesCore ContributorThe Core Contributor role is assigned as the Reviewer in all of the preset proposal templates.üìù Proposal Categories and TemplatesYou will start with these 8 categories and a corresponding proposal template for each:GrantsTechPartnershipsEducationTokenomicsCommunityArt DirectionGovernanceüí¨ Forum CategoriesYou will start with these 6 forum categories:AnnouncementsEventsGeneralKnowledgeShowcaseSupport & Feedback

pages.title: Collaborate

content.text: This is where the collaboration magic begins!
Default members have full access to this page and subpages.
Here's your quick guide to making team magic:
below and create a page for the team to get started.
Need a teammate's focus? Just @-mention them. It's equivalent to a friendly poke... but less pokey!
: Linking to another page? @-mention it and create a handy shortcut. Your team's workflow just got smoother!
: Spot something interesting? Highlight, click the comment icon, and drop your two cents right where it matters.
in the top right corner) and watch them transform into colorful suggestions, ready for the editors to review.

pages.contentText: This is where the collaboration magic begins! Default members have full access to this page and subpages.Here's your quick guide to making team magic:üìÑ Insert a Page: just type /insert page below and create a page for the team to get started.üì£ Ping with @-Mentions: Need a teammate's focus? Just @-mention them. It's equivalent to a friendly poke... but less pokey!üîó Page Links Made Easy: Linking to another page? @-mention it and create a handy shortcut. Your team's workflow just got smoother!üí¨ Comments in a Snap: Spot something interesting? Highlight, click the comment icon, and drop your two cents right where it matters.üåà Suggestion Station: Suggest edits by switching to Suggesting mode (click Editing in the top right corner) and watch them transform into colorful suggestions, ready for the editors to review.üëâ Insert a page here!

pages.title: Education

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the educational project's goals and objectives.]
[Specify the target audience, such as NFT enthusiasts, beginners, or a specific segment within the community.]
[Specify if the project involves written guides, video tutorials, webinars, workshops, or any other format.]
[List the specific topics or subjects that the educational resources will cover.]
[Specify the format of the educational content ‚Äì text, video, audio, interactive, etc.]
[Indicate where the educational content will be accessible, such as community forums, a dedicated website, social media, or other platforms.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the team members or roles required for the project, if applicable.]
[Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for the project.]
[Provide an estimated budget breakdown for any expenses associated with the project.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of the project, such as engagement metrics, feedback, or completion rates.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback and making improvements based on community input.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Education and Resources proposal.]

pages.contentText: Project DescriptionObjective: [Provide a brief overview of the educational project's goals and objectives.]Target Audience: [Specify the target audience, such as NFT enthusiasts, beginners, or a specific segment within the community.]Project DetailsContent Type: [Specify if the project involves written guides, video tutorials, webinars, workshops, or any other format.]Topics Covered: [List the specific topics or subjects that the educational resources will cover.]Format: [Specify the format of the educational content ‚Äì text, video, audio, interactive, etc.]Delivery Platforms: [Indicate where the educational content will be accessible, such as community forums, a dedicated website, social media, or other platforms.]TimelineStart Date: [Enter the proposed start date of the project.]End Date: [Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]Resources NeededHuman Resources: [List the team members or roles required for the project, if applicable.]Materials/Tools: [Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for the project.]Budget: [Provide an estimated budget breakdown for any expenses associated with the project.]Evaluation and Success MetricsKey Performance Indicators (KPIs): [List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of the project, such as engagement metrics, feedback, or completion rates.]Feedback and Improvement: [Outline a plan for collecting feedback and making improvements based on community input.]Additional Notes[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Education and Resources proposal.]

pages.title: Tokenomics

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the Tokenomics project's goals and objectives.]
[Describe the proposed token distribution model, including initial allocation, vesting periods, and any mechanisms for ongoing distribution.]
[Specify the use cases for the community token within the NFT ecosystem, such as governance, access to exclusive content, or staking.]
[Explain how the community token will integrate with NFTs, if applicable, and any benefits or perks for token holders.]
[Provide details on the economic model, including inflationary or deflationary mechanisms, if any, and how the token supply will be managed over time.]
[Explain how the utility of the token contributes to its scarcity and value proposition.]
[Detail how token holders will participate in governance decisions, including voting power and any associated governance mechanisms.]
[Outline the process for proposing and implementing changes to the tokenomics model, including community input and voting procedures.]
[Specify any rewards or incentives for token holders, such as airdrops, staking rewards, or exclusive access to events.]
[Explain how the proposed tokenomics will contribute to the growth and sustainability of the NFT community.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the tokenomics project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the team members or roles required for the project, if applicable.]
[Provide an estimated budget breakdown for any expenses associated with the tokenomics project.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of the tokenomics project, such as community engagement, token adoption, and governance participation.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback and making improvements based on community input.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Tokenomics proposal.]

pages.title: Art Direction

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the art direction project's goals and objectives.]
[Explain how the proposed art direction aligns with the overall theme, vision, and identity of the NFT community.]
[Describe the visual elements you plan to incorporate, such as color schemes, typography, and overall design aesthetics.]
[Explain how the art direction will contribute to storytelling within the NFT community, if applicable.]
[Outline plans for developing or refining the community's visual brand, including logos, banners, and other brand assets.]
[If applicable, detail plans for designing NFT collections, including themes, rarity levels, and overall artistic approach.]
[Detail plans for collaborating with artists within the community or external artists, if applicable.]
[Describe how the community will be involved in the decision-making process regarding art direction.]
[Specify the design principles and guidelines that will be followed in creating visual content for the community.]
[Ensure consistency in visual elements across various platforms, including social media, websites, and other community spaces.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the art direction project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the team members or roles required for the project, including designers, artists, or any other relevant roles.]
[Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for the project.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback on the art direction, including surveys or community forums.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the visual impact of the art direction on the community.]
[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed art direction.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Art Direction proposal.]

pages.title: Grants

content.text: Grants usually fund one-of initiatives perceived as creating value for the community. Examples include product/protocol modules, code reviews, relevant research, bd/growth initiatives, and ecosystem support initiatives. When the grant amount or delivery duration is significant, proposals can include milestones and quantitative metrics on what constitutes successful delivery. When the initiative benefits multiple communities, disclosing other funding applications can serve as a positive social signal.
[Provide a brief overview of the project's goals and objectives for which the grant is being sought.]
[Explain how the proposed project aligns with the overall goals and values of the NFT community.]
[Detail the specific activities, tasks, or deliverables that the grant will support.]
[Provide a proposed timeline for project completion, including key milestones and deadlines.]
[Specify the amount of the grant requested and provide a breakdown of how the funds will be allocated.]
[Explain the rationale behind each budget item and how it contributes to the success of the project.]
[List the key team members involved in the project, including their roles and expertise.]
[Highlight the relevant experience and qualifications of the project team members.]
[Specify the measurable goals and outcomes of the project that the grant will help achieve.]
[Explain how the project will positively impact the NFT community.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of the project and how they will be tracked.]
[Outline a schedule for project updates and reporting to the NFT community and grant providers.]
[Describe how the NFT community will be involved in or benefit from the project.]
[Explain how feedback from the community will be collected and considered during the project.]
[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Grant proposal.]

pages.title: Governance

content.text: Sometimes a community needs to change its governance, e.g., migrating from  Governor Alpha to Governor Bravo. Typically these meta-governance proposals take the form of contract migrations, but they can also involve the creation of subgroup structures. Additionally, they can involve
off-chain governance structures, such as moving governance forums, adopting off-chain voting methods, etc.
[Provide a brief overview of the governance project's goals and objectives.]
[Describe the proposed governance model, including decision-making processes, voting mechanisms, and roles within the governance structure.]
[Explain the proposed voting system, including details on voting power, frequency of voting, and how decisions will be implemented.]
[If applicable, describe the role of a governance token in the proposed governance model, including distribution, utility, and voting power.]
[Outline the process for submitting governance proposals, including requirements and submission channels.]
[Describe how community members can provide input on proposed governance changes and decisions.]
[Specify the initial distribution plan for governance tokens, if applicable.]
[If relevant, outline any vesting periods for governance tokens to encourage long-term commitment.]
[List the roles within the governance committee and their respective responsibilities.]
[Describe how individuals are selected or elected to participate in the governance committee.]
[If applicable, outline how funds within the governance budget will be allocated and managed.]
[Explain how the community will have visibility into the allocation and utilization of governance funds.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the governance project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of the governance project, such as participation rates, successful proposals, and community satisfaction.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback on the governance model and making adjustments based on community input.]
[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed governance model.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Governance proposal.]

pages.contentText: Sometimes a community needs to change its governance, e.g., migrating from  Governor Alpha to Governor Bravo. Typically these meta-governance proposals take the form of contract migrations, but they can also involve the creation of subgroup structures. Additionally, they can involve using off-chain governance structures, such as moving governance forums, adopting off-chain voting methods, etc.Project DescriptionObjective: [Provide a brief overview pages.title: Community

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the community project's goals and objectives.]
[Explain how the proposed project aims to enhance engagement, inclusivity, and collaboration within the NFT community.]
[Outline plans for organizing community events, such as meetups, webinars, or virtual gatherings.]
[Detail initiatives to improve or establish community forums for discussions and knowledge sharing.]
[Describe plans for collaborating with other NFT communities or related groups.]
[Detail any potential partnerships that can strengthen the community ecosystem.]
[Outline plans for onboarding new community members, including educational resources and support.]

[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed community initiatives.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Community proposal.]

pages.title: Technology

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the technology project's goals and objectives.]
[Explain how the proposed project will contribute to technological advancements within the NFT community.]
[Outline plans for integrating blockchain technology into the community, including support for various blockchain networks.]
[Detail initiatives related to smart contract development, deployment, and optimization within the NFT ecosystem.]
[Describe plans for building and maintaining community nodes, if applicable.]
[Outline strategies for implementing decentralized storage solutions for NFTs and related data.]
[Detail measures to ensure the security of blockchain networks and smart contracts within the community.]

[Describe plans for achieving interoperability with other blockchain networks, if applicable.]

[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]

pages.title: Partnerships

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the partnership and/or collaboration project's goals and objectives.]
[Explain how the proposed project aims to strengthen the NFT community ecosystem through strategic partnerships.]
[Outline the process for identifying and selecting potential partners within and outside the NFT space.]
[Detail the specific collaborative initiatives or projects that will result from the proposed partnerships.]
[Specify the criteria used to ensure that potential partners align with the values and goals of the NFT community.]
[Explain how partnerships will provide mutual benefits to both the NFT community and the partner organizations.]
[Describe how the community will be involved in the decision-making process regarding partnerships and collaborations.]
[Outline measures to ensure transparency in the partnership selection process.]
[Detail plans for partnerships that involve technology integration or collaboration on technical projects.]
[Describe strategies for marketing and promotional activities resulting from partnerships.]
[Explain how resources, expertise, or knowledge will be shared between the NFT community and partner organizations.]
[Detail plans for cross-promotional activities to enhance visibility for both parties.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the partnerships and collaborations project.]

[Outline a plan for collecting feedback on partnerships and making adjustments based on community input.]
[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed partnerships and collaborations.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Partnerships & Collaborations proposal.]

[Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for managing partnerships.]Evaluation and Success MetricsPartnership Impact: [List the metrics that will be used to measure the success and impact of the partnerships and collaborations.]Community Feedback: [Outline a plan for collecting feedback on partnerships and making adjustments based on community input.]ApprovalApproval Deadline: [Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]Community Feedback: [Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed partnerships and collaborations.]Additional Notes[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Partnerships & Collaborations proposal.]

children.title: Member Onboarding

content.text: Create an onboarding experience for your members. Customize the callouts below with your onboarding information.  Add a new
.  You can also make use of 4 list types to better organize your info:
The information hub serves as a guide for individuals interested in becoming part of

, including joining its guilds, participating in events, contributing to bounties, and assuming roles such as a DAO Member or Community Member. Discover the various opportunities available to you and how to get started.
= Members who work for the DAO on a full-time basis [may hold non-voting shares or loot]
= Members who work for the DAO on a project-by-project basis [may hold non-voting shares or loot]
How to use DAO Member private discord channels

A web3 onboarding funnel is a series of steps or stages that help introduce people to the concept of web3 and decentralized finance. Such a funnel would provide people with the necessary knowledge and tools to navigate the world of web3 and decentralized finance safely and effectively while avoiding common pitfalls such as scams and misinformation.
One potential approach to creating a web3 onboarding funnel might involve the following steps:
Start by explaining the basics of web3 and decentralized finance, including key concepts such as blockchain technology, decentralization, and the use of smart contracts.
Next, provide guidance on how to securely store and manage cryptocurrencies, emphasizing the importance of keeping one's private keys safe and never sharing them with others.

Introduce people to the concept of decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs), and explain how they can be used to govern and coordinate decentralized networks in a transparent and democratic manner.
Provide resources and information on how to identify and avoid common scams and other forms of fraud in the web3 and decentralized finance space.
Finally, direct people to resources and tools that can help them find and join regenerative DAOs that align with their values and goals.

Overall, the key to creating an effective web3 onboarding funnel is to provide clear, concise, and accessible information that helps people understand the basics of web3 and decentralized finance, while also equipping them with the knowledge and tools they need to navigate this complex and rapidly evolving space safely and confidently.

Such a funnel would provide people with the necessary knowledge and tools to navigate the world of web3 and decentralized finance safely and effectively while avoiding common pitfalls such as scams and misinformation.One potential approach to creating a web3 onboarding funnel might involve the following steps:Start by explaining the basics of web3 and decentralized finance, including key concepts such as blockchain technology, decentralization, and the use of smart contracts.Next, provide guidance on how to securely store and manage cryptocurrencies, emphasizing the importance of keeping one's private keys safe and never sharing them with others.Introduce people to the concept of decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs), and explain how they can be used to govern and coordinate decentralized networks in a transparent and democratic manner.Provide resources and information on how to identify and avoid common scams and other forms of fraud in the web3 and decentralized finance space.Finally, direct people to resources and tools that can help them find and join regenerative DAOs that align with their values and goals.Overall, the key to creating an effective web3 onboarding funnel is to provide clear, concise, and accessible information that helps people understand the basics of web3 and decentralized finance, while also equipping them with the knowledge and tools they need to navigate this complex and rapidly evolving space safely and confidently.

children.title: Role Definition

content.text: What are the different ways to contribute to your
? Let your members know how they fit in.
DAO Member is a person, organization, multi-signature entity, or any other entity that holds at least one full share of

DAO. As a member, they have full access to the workspace, including the ability to view and comment on every page, create bounties, proposals, and suggestions for editing existing content, as well as unrestricted access to create unlimited pages, sub-pages, texts, and any other form of content they desire.
Team has a simple yet crucial mandate, which is to uphold the DAO Constitution and act in a responsible and ethical manner in the execution of its duties within the
. Their specific roles, obligations, and responsibilities are clearly outlined in the DAO Constitution.

Individuals, Multi-Sigs, or entities that complete any form of onboarding process are granted the role of a Community Member. This may include earning POAPs, participating in Discord chats, engaging on Twitter, earning NFT badges, attending events and receiving event tokens, earning ERC-20 tokens, winning limited edition NFTs, or participating in raffles. Community Members have access to the bounties section, information hub, and the ability to create proposals for DAO Members to review and consider.

Their specific roles, obligations, and responsibilities are clearly outlined in the DAO Constitution.Community MemberIndividuals, Multi-Sigs, or entities that complete any form of onboarding process are granted the role of a Community Member. This may include earning POAPs, participating in Discord chats, engaging on Twitter, earning NFT badges, attending events and receiving event tokens, earning ERC-20 tokens, winning limited edition NFTs, or participating in raffles. Community Members have access to the bounties section, information hub, and the ability to create proposals for DAO Members to review and consider.

children.title: Explainer Video Script

content.text: One Liner > Kokonut Network is a Project to Promote, Fund, & Manage Coconut Farms

Why Coconuts? > It is the most cultivated and vital palm tree in the world, as it is currently the main source of vegetable fat, Coconut is one of the plants that provide the greatest diversity of products and by-products in the world, being a primary source of food, drinks, and refuge for animals
In 2020, the global Coconut market size was
and it is expected to reach

Why a DAO and not a Company with Investors? > Answer is simple [Governance, Transparency, Accounting & Growth] while we build a worldwide community that share our vision and support us shape the future of agriculture + web3
: KokonutDAO shareholders will vote to determine the schedule of rewards for distribution in the future as new product launches, Charity Events & Agriculture Start-Ups Incubator Projects.
: Shareholders would be able to propose business ideas, proposals, new products and discuss ideas on how to enhance DAO funds far beyond the 40% base rewards from KOKONUT V1 profits.

With high demand from the national and international markets, Annual domestic production does not meet the demand. Every year Dominican Republic alone imports about 25 million units of coconut, which return to international markets as exports of coconut derivatives by-products.

We Incorporate six hundred and twenty (620) Acres of land in optimal conditions, into the national production system; to be able to increase national annual production by 18,000,000 coconuts, and decrease the shortage in the market. While we benefit and reward the whole KokonutDAO community and we create more than 10,000 direct and indirect jobs?¬†
"Kokonut V1" is our first coconut plantation located in Los Saladillos, Dominican Republic [map widget]

Kokonut V1 consists of 60,000 coconut plants that would produce roughly 18 million coconuts per year for wholesaling to international markets and to Industrialize its direct products, such as Copra and Water as a fresh drink, as well as its other derivatives to add value to production.

They will be planted at a sowing frame of 7.5 x 7.5 meters away from each plant. That is equivalent to ninety-six (96) plants per acre of land, which equals 60,000 plants within the six hundred and twenty (620) Acres of land in hand. This variety is capable of producing about three hundred (300) fruits per plant, which makes about 18,000,000 units each year. The market price is around USD 0.44 per unit, which would be equal to USD 7,920,000.00 per year alongside more than 10,663 direct and indirect jobs.
The total cost of financing this project amounts to
will be for the preparation of the land. Also,
will be for agricultural work, and another
will be used for the purchase of: inputs, materials and equipment. In addition, about
are for the paymentof agricultural insurance.

Forecast Expenses are just approximated. We will work every month on achieving milestones, based on the master business plan for each quarter. We will vote every 4 months to approve the quarter's budget, then we will do 1 monthly vote to approve the subsequent month's plan. The vote will take place on the 21st of each month.

for a healthy project, 1 KokonutDAO Share per plant will be issued Only 60,000 "kokonut dao shares" will issued for Kokonut V1. Each one for an contribution of USD$20.00. This way we achieve the initial funding amount needed, to develop the project for 4 years until the farm is ready for the first round of harvesting. More shares will be issued for our next phase Kokonut V2 300,000 Plants 2026~.

For the purpouse of Transparency, we will use blockchain technology for each coconut plant ownership and open source accounting and enterprise system so we can offer real-time access for every member of the KokonutDAO.
: $1,200,000 [4 years budget, ~16 years harvesting until re-planting]

‚Äî Our V1 Plantation consists of 60,000 coconut plants that will produce roughly 18,000,000 coconuts per year, average local wholesale price is $0.44 this equals $7,920,000 per year [we're already working on securing international buyers so we can export our product and get even more revenue.

‚Äî Coconuts is one of the most useful fruits on the planet, you can make coconut milk, coconut oil, coconut body cream, coconut water, and so on, the list is almost endless, that is why this is one of the most profitable fruits in the agriculture sector.

‚Äî Besides just producing and selling the coconut, we're also planning to create a range of products like coconut milk, coconut water, coconut pulp, and beauty products for retail and wholesale to international conglomerates.
all of the project sales, expenses, payroll, accounting and reports will be managed by an open source ERP System, API & username;passwords credentials will be available for KokonutDAO members.
Profesional Team With 35+ Years In Experience
KOKONUT LOGO > Join us on your favorite social network for more info
We're happy to answer. Email us at hello@kokonut.network and we'll get back to you ASAP.

children.contentText: IntroKokonut Network {Agriculture For Communities}One Liner > Kokonut Network is a Project to Promote, Fund, & Manage Coconut Farms Connecting Web3, Social + Agricultureü••üå¥Why Coconuts? > It is the most cultivated and vital palm tree in the world, as it is currently the main source of vegetable fat, Coconut is one of the plants that provide the greatest diversity of products and by-products in the world, being a primary source of food, drinks, and refuge for animalsIn 2020, the global Coconut market size was US$12,600 million and it is expected to reach US$20,630 million by the end of 2027.Why a DAO and not a Company with Investors? > Answer is simple [Governance, Transparency, Accounting & Growth] while we build a worldwide community that share our vision and support us shape the future of agriculture + web3Governance: KokonutDAO shareholders will vote to determine the schedule of rewards for distribution in the future as new product launches, Charity Events & Agriculture Start-Ups Incubator Projects.KokonutDAO: Shareholders would be able to propose business ideas, proposals, new products and discuss ideas on how to enhance DAO funds far beyond the 40% base rewards from KOKONUT V1 profits.ProblemWith high demand from the national and international markets, Annual domestic production does not meet the demand. Every year Dominican Republic alone imports about 25 million units of coconut, which return to international markets as exports of coconut derivatives by-products.wouldn‚Äôt it be nice ifWe Incorporate six hundred and twenty (620) Acres of land in optimal conditions, into the national production system; to be able to increase national annual production by 18,000,000 coconuts, and decrease the shortage in the market. While we benefit and reward the whole KokonutDAO community and we create more than 10,000 direct and indirect jobs?¬†We Got a Plan!SOLUTION > Kokonut Network"Kokonut V1" is our first coconut plantation located in Los Saladillos, Dominican Republic [map widget]Kokonut V1 consists of 60,000 coconut plants that would produce roughly 18 million coconuts per year for wholesaling to international markets and to Industrialize its direct products, such as Copra and Water as a fresh drink, as well as its other derivatives to add value to production.Numbers, Graph & Data WidgetsThey will be planted at a sowing frame of 7.5 x 7.5 meters away from each plant. That is equivalent to ninety-six (96) plants per acre of land, which equals 60,000 plants within the six hundred and twenty (620) Acres of land in hand. This variety is capable of producing about three hundred (300) fruits per plant, which makes about 18,000,000 units each year. The market price is around USD 0.44 per unit, which would be equal to USD 7,920,000.00 per year alongside more than 10,663 direct and indirect jobs.The total cost of financing this project amounts to USD 1,055,270.08 (U.S DOLLARS). Of which USD 137,500.00 will be for the preparation of the land. Also, USD 475,000.00 will be for agricultural work, and another USD 421,325.95 will be used for the purchase of: inputs, materials and equipment. In addition, about USD 21,444.13 are for the paymentof agricultural insurance.Forecast Expenses are just approximated. We will work every month on achieving milestones, based on the master business plan for each quarter. We will vote every 4 months to approve the quarter's budget, then we will do 1 monthly vote to approve the subsequent month's plan. The vote will take place on the 21st of each month.DAO Economics for a healthy project, 1 KokonutDAO Share per plant will be issued Only 60,000 "kokonut dao shares" will issued for Kokonut V1. Each one for an contribution of USD$20.00. This way we achieve the initial funding amount needed, to develop the project for 4 years until the farm is ready for the first round of harvesting. More shares will be issued for our next phase Kokonut V2 300,000 Plants 2026~.For the purpouse of Transparency, we will use blockchain technology for each coconut plant ownership and open source accounting and enterprise system so we can offer real-time access for every member of the KokonutDAO.DAO Contract: 0xFfe8A8ec2477390c6b97074f44326fac24D7f6DDProtocol: DAOHaus FrameworkNetwork Chain: children.title: Kokonut DAO Membership Perks Video Script

content.text: 2 00:00:03,368 --> 00:00:11,114 The following list explains in detail the meaning of being a member of Kokonut DAO.
3 00:00:11,114 --> 00:00:16,316 What to expect from being a shareholder?
4 00:00:16,316 --> 00:00:30,086 Exclusive access to members-only events, meet-ups, and governance tools available for Kokonut DAO members.
5 00:00:30,086 --> 00:00:37,341 These are 8 benefits of Kokonut Network DAO membership.

7 00:00:42,758 --> 00:00:58,105 Coconut plants usually last 16 years bearing fruits, replanting them once they no longer produce, the plantation will live forever. Our members will be enjoying a lifetime of rewards, membership status, and exclusive access to our whole network.
9 00:01:02,418 --> 00:01:10,872 We have developed a business plan, reward mechanisms, growth plan, and revenue-generating streams backed by our coconut plantation.
12 00:01:20,172 --> 00:01:29,232 Kokonut DAO transactions, treasury, and proposals are public. Anyone can and should audit this information in the blockchain explorer.

14 00:01:34,458 --> 00:01:47,593 Kokonut DAO data is stored in the Gnosis Chain forever, immutable to changes. Anyone with a phone or pc can join the DAO, permissionless and borderless because the DAO lives in the blockchain for worldwide access.
15 00:01:47,593 --> 00:01:53,971 3. Funds Secured By Kokonut DAO Members.
16 00:01:53,971 --> 00:01:59,989 2. Voting Rights On Key Business Decisions.

17 00:01:59,989 --> 00:02:11,506 Members can vote on critical or severe decisions that may affect or benefit the organization as a whole, like product launches, Charity, and Kokonut Network Expansion.
1.Plantation Earnings For Life. One Kokonut DAO share = One coconut plant lifetime ownership
19 00:02:19,474 --> 00:02:33,412 Kokonut DAO members will receive lifetime profits the plantation generates from sales, deals & branded products.
20 00:02:33,412 --> 00:02:38,854 Kokonut DAO doesn‚Äôt consume your time
21 00:02:38,854 --> 00:02:53,656 There are a lot of DAOs out there that are just good ideas, great design & marketing. Without a real business plan backing them up.
22 00:02:53,656 --> 00:03:05,530 Tons of projects get rug-pulled or end up abandoned by their users because teams can't deliver a good product.
23 00:03:05,530 --> 00:03:14,236 Be smart, do your research, and choose the right path to freedom.
24 00:03:14,236 --> 00:03:20,944 Learn more at kokonut.network Follow us on Twitter @KokonutNetwork
We are pleased to show some of the utility behind our Kokonut DAO Membership.
The following video explains in detail the meaning of being a member of Kokonut DAO.
What to expect from being a shareholder?
Exclusive access to members-only events, meet-ups, and governance tools available for Kokonut DAO members.
These are 8 benefits of Kokonut Network DAO membership.
Coconut plants usually last 16 years bearing fruits, replanting them once they no longer produce, the plantation will live forever.
Our members will enjoy a lifetime of rewards, membership status, and exclusive access to our whole network.
We have developed a business plan, reward mechanisms, growth plan, and revenue-generating streams backed by our coconut plantation.
We will share monthly reports and updates about how the project is performing. Whether that's sales projections, profits, or expenses.
Kokonut DAO transactions, treasury, and proposals are public. Anyone can and should audit this information in the blockchain explorer.
Kokonut DAO data is stored in the Gnosis Chain forever, immutable to changes.
Anyone with a phone or PC can join the DAO, permissionless and borderless because the DAO lives in the blockchain for worldwide access.
Funds Secured By Kokonut DAO Members.
One of the best "perks" about being a Kokonut DAO member is that YOU and only YOU control what happens with the money.
Members have the power to vote on how the DAO treasury is disbursed or applied towards the Kokonut V1 working plan.
Voting Rights On Key Business Decisions.
Members can vote on critical or severe decisions that may affect or benefit the organization, like product launches, Charity, and Kokonut Network Expansion.
We are transparency at its finest
One Kokonut DAO share = One coconut plant lifetime ownership
Kokonut DAO members will receive lifetime profits, which the plantation will generate from sales, deals & branded products.
Kokonut DAO doesn‚Äôt consume your time.
There are a lot of DAOs out there that are just good ideas, great design & marketing. Without a real business plan backing them up.
Tons of projects get rug-pulled or end up abandoned by their users because teams can't deliver a good product.
Be smart, do your research, and choose the right path to freedom.
Learn more at kokonut.network & Follow us on Twitter @KokonutNetwork

Anyone with a phone or pc can join the DAO, permissionless and borderless because the DAO lives in the blockchain for worldwide access.15 00:01:47,593 --> 00:01:53,971 3. Funds Secured By Kokonut DAO Members.16 00:01:53,971 --> 00:01:59,989 2. Voting Rights On Key Business Decisions.17 00:01:59,989 --> 00:02:11,506 Members can vote on critical or severe decisions that may affect or benefit the organization as a whole, like product launches, Charity, and Kokonut Network Expansion.18 00:02:11,506 --> 00:02:19,4741.Plantation Earnings For Life. One Kokonut DAO share = One coconut plant lifetime ownership19 00:02:19,474 --> 00:02:33,412 Kokonut DAO members will receive lifetime profits the plantation generates from sales, deals & branded products.20 00:02:33,412 --> 00:02:38,854 Kokonut DAO doesn‚Äôt consume your time21 00:02:38,854 --> 00:02:53,656 There are a lot of DAOs out there that are just good ideas, great design & marketing. Without a real business plan backing them up.22 00:02:53,656 --> 00:03:05,530 Tons of projects get rug-pulled or end up abandoned by their users because teams can't deliver a good product.23 00:03:05,530 --> 00:03:14,236 Be smart, do your research, and choose the right path to freedom.24 00:03:14,236 --> 00:03:20,944 Learn more at kokonut.network Follow us on Twitter @KokonutNetworkWe are pleased to show some of the utility behind our Kokonut DAO Membership.The following video explains in detail the meaning of being a member of Kokonut DAO.What to expect from being a shareholder?Exclusive access to members-only events, meet-ups, and governance tools available for Kokonut DAO members.These are 8 benefits of Kokonut Network DAO membership.Lifetime Project Longevity.Coconut plants usually last 16 years bearing fruits, replanting them once they no longer produce, the plantation will live forever.Our members will enjoy a lifetime of rewards, membership status, and exclusive access to our whole network.Real Business Model.We have developed a business plan, reward mechanisms, growth plan, and revenue-generating streams backed by our coconut plantation.Open Source Accounting.We will share monthly reports and updates about how the project is performing. Whether that's sales projections, profits, or expenses.Blockchain Verified.Kokonut DAO transactions, treasury, and proposals are public. Anyone can and should audit this information in the blockchain explorer.Decentralized By Default.Kokonut DAO data is stored in the Gnosis Chain forever, immutable to changes.Anyone with a phone or PC can join the DAO, permissionless and borderless because the DAO lives in the blockchain for worldwide access.Funds Secured By Kokonut DAO Members.One of the best "perks" about being a Kokonut DAO member is that YOU and only YOU control what happens with the money.Members have the power to vote on how the DAO treasury is disbursed or applied towards the Kokonut V1 working plan.Voting Rights On Key Business Decisions.Members can vote on critical or severe decisions that may affect or benefit the organization, like product launches, Charity, and Kokonut Network Expansion.We are transparency at its finestPlantation Earnings For Life.One Kokonut DAO share = One coconut plant lifetime ownershipKokonut DAO members will receive lifetime profits, which the plantation will generate from sales, deals & branded products.Kokonut DAO doesn‚Äôt consume your time.There are a lot of DAOs out there that are just good ideas, great design & marketing. Without a real business plan backing them up.Tons of projects get rug-pulled or end up abandoned by their users because teams can't deliver a good product.Be smart, do your research, and choose the right path to freedom.Learn more at kokonut.network & Follow us on Twitter @KokonutNetwork

posts.title: Get the conversation started!

content.text: It is easy to start a conversation here, in CharmVerse! Simply click
from the dropdown menu. Make sure to title your post because you won't be able to publish it without one.
When creating a post, you have access to most of the CharmEditor's cool features.
text to style, format, or add a link
to bring up a menu of available blocks. Insert an image or video, embed a tweet or NFT, and more.
-mention a member, role, or even a page to add a useful link
It is also easy to join a conversation! Reply or add your thoughts below a post. The
comments will be threaded and easy to follow. And if you think a post is really amazing, don't forget to upvote
